message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Bob, my friend, let's be realistic. This is a decent offer considering the circumstances.
The value of money isn't changing for me, but it is for you. I think this is more than fair.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at any potential gains for both of us.
Inflation is really hurting your gains, Alice. This is a generous offer considering the situation. I think it's time we settle this.
